name: Dancing for Food - v1.1.5
description:
* Control dancer idle animation with size of stack in their first item slot.  Use gold coins for more control.
* Musical Incense item available to admin spawn.
* Enhance Legendary Kit upgrade tool available for making legendary weapons better (requires Feat).
* Marathon Potion for running long distances.
* Thralls with 300 ammo no longer run out of ammo.
changeNote:
Added Enhanced Legendary Kit and Marathon Potion
Thralls with 300 ammo no longer run out of ammo.
author: Iain King
